Catawiki Automation
A Seleniumâ€‘based test automation framework for Catawiki features.
Built with Java, Maven, and Cucumber (BDD) to drive web browser
scenarios against the Catawiki site.

ğŸ“¦ Prerequisites
* Tests are executed on Apple Macbook M5 Silicon (ARM)
* Java JDK 11+ (ensure java and javac are on your PATH)
* Maven 3.6+ (mvn command)
* Chrome browser (driven via WebDriver)
* (Optional) appropriate WebDriver binaries in Drivers

  
ğŸ›  Setup
* Clone the repository
  ```
  git clone <repo-url>
  cd com.catawiki.automation
  ```
* Install dependencies
  ```
  mvn clean install
  ```
* Configure drivers
* Place chromedriver, geckodriver, etc. in Drivers folder or adjust your PATH.
Adjust configuration

Edit log4j2.xml for logging preferences.
Modify any base URLs or timeouts in page objects or utilities.

ğŸ§ª Running Tests

* Execute all Cucumber tests via Maven:
  ```
  mvn test
  ```

* Run a specific feature or runner class:
  ```
  mvn test -Dtest=TestRunner
  ```

After execution, results are available in cucumber-report.html and
surefire-reports.

ğŸ”§ Utilities & Helpers

* waitUtils â€“ explicit/wait helpers
* verificationUtils â€“ assertion helpers/logging
* takesScreenshotUtils â€“ capture screenshots on failure

ğŸ“‚ Reporting & Artifacts
* Screenshots saved to screenshots
* Cucumber JSON/HTML reports in target
* Maven Surefire XML reports in surefire-reports
